column4: how do i install ubuntu if the one in the repository does not work?
Whenever i try to install from add/remove programs, azureus does not work.
it starts up and then crashes
this is one of the not so great places to get support for Ubuntu, let alone another distro.
If you run azureus in the terminal, it should give you output
OK, here's what we all think: you are running a different version of Java. Not sun java. GC java. So, there are two options.
Or run update-alternatives --config java and select the sun-java package as the default
Select the one with "sun" and "java" in it.
I mean, we basically did the same thing that clicking on that Azureus icon would do.
Try running azureus without terminal this time
